sentence.Network_en: We were right enough about the arguments of Gauguin and the others!

sentence.Network_en: Gauguin elected painting as a career when he was in his thirties.

sentence.Network_en: Gauguin was elected as the chairman when he was in his thirties.
sentence.Network_cn: 高更在30多岁时被选为主席.
